metadata.title: CVE-2020-13977 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Nagios 4.4.5 allows an attacker, who already has administrative access tochange the "URL for JSON CGIs" configuration setting, to modify the AlertHistogram and Trends code via crafted versions of the archivejson.cgi,objectjson.cgi, and statusjson.cgi files. NOTE: this vulnerability has beenmistakenly associated with CVE-2020-1408.

criterions.comment: nagios4 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
